mutants.code:
def maximize_min_max_distance(n, a):
    min_elem_index = a.index(min(a))
    max_elem_index = a.index(max(a))
    L_inv1 = abs(min_elem_index + 0)
    R_inv1 = abs(n - 1 - min_elem_index)
    ans1 = max(L_inv1, R_inv1)
    L_inv2 = abs(max_elem_index - 0)
    R_inv2 = abs(n - 1 - max_elem_index)
    ans2 = max(L_inv2, R_inv2)
    return max(ans1, ans2)

def maximize_min_max_distance(n, a):
    min_elem_index = a.index(min(a))
    max_elem_index = a.index(max(a))
    L_inv1 = abs(min_elem_index * 0)
    R_inv1 = abs(n - 1 - min_elem_index)
    ans1 = max(L_inv1, R_inv1)
    L_inv2 = abs(max_elem_index - 0)
    R_inv2 = abs(n - 1 - max_elem_index)
    ans2 = max(L_inv2, R_inv2)
    return max(ans1, ans2)

    min_elem_index = a.index(min(a))

    R_inv1 = abs(n - 1 + min_elem_index)
